price: Dájúdájú A fún (Ànábì) Dāwūd àti (Ànábì) Sulaemọ̄n ní ìmọ̀. Àwọn méjèèjì sì sọ pé: “Gbogbo ẹyìn ń jẹ́ ti Allāhu, Ẹni tí Ó fún wa ní oore àjùlọ lórí ọ̀pọ̀lọ́pọ̀ nínú àwọn ẹrúsìn Rẹ̀, àwọn onígbàgbọ́ òdodo.”
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا دَاوُۥدَ وَسُلَيۡمَٰنَ عِلۡمٗاۖ وَقَالَا ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي فَضَّلَنَا عَلَىٰ كَثِيرٖ مِّنۡ عِبَادِهِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā dāwūda wasulaymāna ʿil'man waqālā al-ḥamdu lillahi alladhī faḍḍalanā ʿalā kathīrin min ʿibādihi al-mu'minīna
